title: Help, Sans Serif.
content:
This type was found on a Postcard. Looks like Letter Gothic Medium or Trade Gothic. But I know it's a free font... What font is this and where can I get it for free?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055046im_/http:/typophile.com/files/billia_4954.gif)

Thank you.
author: Panda

comments.content: Why do you say it's not Letter Gothic?

It's Letter Gothic. Maybe you just compared it with Adobe's version of it.  
It's more likely to be ParaType's "New Letter Gothic". You'll see the difference on the finial of the letter "J".

But, to answer your question. A free "Gothic Letter" look-alike called "Letter Gothic Line" is available here:  
 [http://www.dailyfreefonts.com/fonts/info/1325-Letter-Gothic-Line.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100909055046/http:/www.dailyfreefonts.com/fonts/info/1325-Letter-Gothic-Line.html "http://www.dailyfreefonts.com/fonts/info/1325-Letter-Gothic-Line.html")
Yeah, you are right guys... I'll go with Letter Gothic. Thanks for your help.
